description: Maximal number of unattacked squares with n queens on n X n board (answers for n >= 17 only probable).
links: Bernard Lemaire, Pavel Vitushinkiy, Placing n non dominating queens on the n X n chessboard. Part I, French Federation of Mathematical Games
Bernard Lemaire, Pavel Vitushinkiy, Placing n non dominating queens on the n X n chessboard. Part II, French Federation of Mathematical Games
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Queens Problem.
author: Mario Velucchi (mathchess(AT)velucchi.it)
